_sText:
Back in 2016 I started 2 things, studying at a university and working on a map. You see I had just figured out how to deal with problems in Hammer, this essentially allowed me to make bigger, more complex maps. And I wanted to put my skills and efforts to the test... So i took an old idea I had for 1.6 and made these monsters of maps...Needless to say I learned alot, made several prefabs in the process and gained a massive headache in attempting to bend Hammer to my will...

The complete pack contains every single map from project-Wintermaze-2016 with VX being the crown jewel. 

About the map pack: 

See the video for a guide of other maps. Alternate maps are seen on images.

Contains all the maps from project: Wintermaze_2016 (9 maps in total, originally planed 10, but couldn't figure out surf mapping). 
If you're a simple individual that want's a somewhat simple map- V0,V1,V2,V3 and Winterhill might be for you. V4 and V5 are huge and quite interactive with trains, helicopter and a working CCTV room as well as an armory.

If you want a bit of crayieness try the  VX it has everything the previous maps has+ a working, explodable nuclear reactor and a working flood system that you can use to flood the tunnels.  

All maps have a working minimap as well. 

Hope you'll like it and will have fun! 

Final words:

This project took a long time to complete, It was a test for myself as a mapper in this process I did learn alot. 

With this I will no longer make maps for Source. Might make some adjustments/corrections to old projects, maybe add some prefabs, but that's about it. I will move on to CS2 now.
